text: Joseph "Joe" Viskocil (December 21, 1952 - August 11, 2014) was an American visual effects artist. He had over 80 credits between 1974 and 2014. His movie credits include Star Wars Episode IV: A New Hope (1977) Star Wars Episode V: The Empire Strikes Back (1980), The Terminator (1984) and Terminator 2: Judgment Day (1991). For Independence Day (1996), he won an Academy Award for Best Visual Effects at the 69th Academy Awards in 1997. Viskocil died on August 11, 2014 in Los Angeles, California from complications from multiple organ failure, aged 61. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1952 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Deaths from multiple organ failure Category:Academy Award winners Category:American artists Category:Disease- related deaths in Los Angeles
title: Joe Viskocil
